Tag_Youmay.description: the memory | the [[Order of Hunters | branch]] of the Order of the Ancients

Tag_Imageneed.description: Assassin's Creed: Odyssey — [[Legacy of the First Blade]]

MemoryInfobox.description: 'The mysterious Order of Hunters came to Makedonia to track Kassandra down and eliminate her. But when she discovered their plan, she turned the hunters into the hunted.'
MemoryInfobox.appearance: 'Assassin's Creed: Odyssey' – 'Legacy of the First Blade: Hunted'

General_Description: '''The Order of Hunters''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: Having learned about the organization, Kassandra set out to eliminate every member of the [[Order of Hunters]].
Section_Outcome: Kassandra eliminated every Order of Hunters members in [[Makedonia]].
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''  – ''[[Legacy of the First Blade: Hunted]]''
